did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Cornell University. Vice President for Academic Programs.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Files of Larry I. Palmer, including general correspondence and miscellaneous reports. Includes records of the Subcommittee for Minority Education, 1984 and records of the Cornell Commission on Undergraduate Education. Also, records of the Cornell University Libraries Director Search and miscellaneous reports.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: Records from 1967 to 1984 are from the Office of Vice Provost; records from 1985 to 1986 are from the office of the Vice President for Academic Programs. The name change did not reflect any change in personnel or responsibilities.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Files of Larry I. Palmer, including general correspondence and miscellaneous reports. Includes records of the Subcommittee for Minority Education, 1984 and records of the Cornell Commission on Undergraduate Education. Also, records of the Cornell University Libraries Director Search and miscellaneous reports.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Cornell University. Office of Vice Provost.
Cornell University. Commission on Undergraduate Education.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Restricted to permission of office of origin.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Cornell University. Vice President for Academic Programs. Larry I. Palmer Records, #4-2-1866. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

arrangement.head: COLLECTION ARRANGEMENT
arrangement.p: Alphabetical by subject within fiscal year.

unittitle.extref: Link to a partial finding aid.

scopecontent.p: All the material in the collection may not be covered by this guide.
